scenes.text: Your shift is halfway done. You are sitting with your friend Mark just outside the workplace.

events.content: Final days of Fall, It's warm for now...
Mark's car, a brand new 1995 model.
He saved forever for this thing...
A new 1995 'Taurus'
I am sitting in the field, it's lunch break... Finally.
I wish Mark could make some choices without always asking me.
I can't believe we only get 20 minute breaks...
I wish I could eat my lunch... but I don't have any...
Maybe I should find someone who can cook...
I don't see myself doing that with this flannel vest on however...
They propably think I can't afford any groceries with it on.
I mean I can't... right now...
Why do you think that is?

dialogue.text: I needed my brand new car...
How else am I gonna get out of this place?
I did study... just not enough... Jackass
There's nothing here anyways, no nice places to work at all...
It's all the fault of the system... I wish I could live off the grid or something
Atleast somewhere far away... where things are new and mysterious

events.content: WE should get out of here!
We can't just stay here forever...
See my car in the back? We could take it right now or wait until summer
We could go right now, or we could go next summer when the weather settles...

scenes.text: You and Mark decide to wait until summer...
You and Mark walk to the car, you head out on the open road...
You refuel the car, you are ready to get back on the road in no-time.
You decide to travel further... until you run out of fuel. Your only option is to scavenge for fuel in the strange machines.

events.content: It's freezing... thankfully it's warmer in the car...
It will only get colder...
WOW! What a monument...
Maybe that's where we should go!
That's what's calling us.
It feels good to be out on the road...
Right?

dialogue.text: Awesome, we can't stop now...
It's to late now to stop.
We are completely free, for the first time...
What's there to have doubts about?

events.content: Where are we going?
Whatever this was... is hasn't been touched for a long time...
I guess that means we are far from home...
Is this what we came for?
What a strange machine...

dialogue.text: These machines were used for battle.
Maybe it could have been a bomb?
Let's keep moving to be safe.
I don't know what it's function was... but it was used for war.
Seems like it's been innactive for a very long time now...
I wonder to who it belonged...

choices.text: I wonder what else is out here.

dialogue.text: I don't want to waste any time not finding out...

events.content: Let's go. We can't spare the fuel anyways.

dialogue.text: Fine... I guess it's nice to stare at.

events.content: What a haunting structure...
It looks very industrial, might be to keep machines cool...
Maybe it's a server room or something.
I can't see a thing trough the snow...
Only makes running away to nowhere better
If you can't read where to go, just go
Looks like we are going to be in trafic for a while...
We could switch seats... I need some rest.

dialogue.text: You switch seats, you are now at the driver's seat
You continue to drive and notice that the fuel is running low...
Better visit a gas station soon...
Suit yourself...

events.content: You are on the road for a few more hours...
As the sky turns grey, it starts cooling down...
This won't go anywhere without fuel...
Better try finding some in these machines.
I hope I don't fall of this thing...
Let's see... where could the fuel storage be...

dialogue.text: I can feel something... a handle
Pull it, it might be a fuel cap.
You twist the handle open, you almost lost your stability...
Your fingers are the first to find out about the fuel inside...
YES! We got fuel!
Great, come on down and let's go.

choices.text: Try punching open a damaged lid

dialogue.text: *METAL CLANG* There's something behind here for sure!
*CLANG* Just one more hit!
*CLUNK* Got it!
You feel a warm sensation on your hand...
Your balance starts to decrease...
You cut yourself badly on the rust...
You fainted and never recovered...

events.content: Can't believe this still has fuel...
You must be careful for the rust...
It could lead to some serious infection.
Don't do anything to risky!
